body.latex: \text{What is the magnitude of } \vec{v} \text{ after being multiplied by } M \text{ where } \\ M = \begin{bmatrix} \cos(\beta) & 0 & \sin(\beta)\\ 0 & 1 & 0\\ -\sin(\beta) & 0 & \cos(\beta) \end{bmatrix} , \vec{v} = \begin{bmatrix} 1\\2\\1 \end{bmatrix} , \text{ and } \beta = \frac{4\pi}{2}
